opendial.gui

Class GUIFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.gui.GUIFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module

    public class GUIFrame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Module
    Main GUI frame for the OpenDial toolkit, encompassing various tabs and menus to control the application

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ICON_PATH 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GUIFrame(DialogueSystem system)
      Constructs (but does not yet display) a new GUI frame for OpenDial.

        Constructs (but does not yet display) a new GUI frame for OpenDial.

      • start

        public void start()
        Displays the GUI frame.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Module

      • pause

        public void pause(boolean pause)
        Pauses the GUI.
        Specified by:
        pause in interface Module
        Parameters:
        pause - whether to pause or resume the module

      • trigger

        public void trigger(DialogueState state,
                    java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> updatedVars)
        Updates the current dialogue state displayed in the component. The current dialogue state is name "current" in the selection list.
        Specified by:
        trigger in interface Module
        Parameters:
        state - the dialogue state
        updatedVars - the set of updated variables

      • refresh

        public void refresh()
        Refreshes the GUI (menu, title and domain content).

      • recordState

        public void recordState(DialogueState state,
                        java.lang.String name)
        Records a dialogue state in the component and makes it available for display in the network selection list on the left side. The network is associated with a specific name. If the name already exists, the previous network is erased.
        Parameters:
        state - the dialogue state to record
        name - the name for the recorded network

      • addComment

        public void addComment(java.lang.String comment)
        Adds a comment to the chat window
        Parameters:
        comment - the comment to add

      • enableSpeech

        public void enableSpeech(boolean toEnable)
        Enables or disables the speech recording functionality in the GUI
        Parameters:
        toEnable - true if the speech functionality should be enabled, else false.

      • setSavedFlag

        protected void setSavedFlag(boolean isSaved)
        If isSaved is false, sets a '*' star on the editor tab to mark the fact that the domain has been modified without being saved. If isSaved is true, removes the '*' star if there was one.
        Parameters:
        isSaved - whether the domain has been saved

      • setActiveTab

        public void setActiveTab(int i)
        Changes the active tab in the GUI.
        Parameters:
        i - the index (0 for the interaction tab, 1 for the state monitor, 2 for the domain editor).

      • closeWindow

        public void closeWindow()
        Closes the window (and OpenDial).

      • isSpeechEnabled

        public boolean isSpeechEnabled()
        Returns whether the speech recording functionality if enabled in the GUI
        Returns:
        true if the speech recording function is activated, else false.

        true if the domain is saved, false otherwise
